Container.Name: xteve-channel-alerts
Container.Overview: Monitors your xTeVe playlist each day and notifies a Discord channel if any channels that previously existed have disappeared. The container downloads the latest M3U from xTeVe, compares it with yesterday's copy that is stored on a volume, and sends a rich-embed Discord alert listing the missing channels. Runs automatically on a cron schedule that you control with an environment variable.

Container.Description: Monitors your xTeVe playlist for missing channels and sends Discord alerts when channels disappear.

Variable.Name: XTEVE_URL
Variable.Description: URL to your xTeVe M3U playlist. Change the IP to match your xTeVe server.

Variable.Name: DISCORD_WEBHOOK_URL
Variable.Description: Discord webhook URL where alerts will be sent. Create one in your Discord server's channel settings.

Variable.Name: CRON_SCHEDULE
Variable.Description: Cron schedule for when to check for missing channels. Default: daily at 4 AM.
